long_description: The fine-thread Kinetic Traxle is a precision-machined replacement axle for mountain bikes that easily adapts a 12mm thru-axle system to firmly lock into Kinetic bike trainer cone cups. Fine thread pitch is compatible with Cannondale, Scott, Specialized, Foundry, Santa Cruz and Intense bikes. Please note that Santa Cruz bikes with a closed dropout on the drive side (2013/14) will not currently work with the Traxle.
short_description: The fine-thread Kinetic Traxle is a precision-machined replacement axle for mountain bikes that easily adapts a 12mm thru-axle system to firmly lock into Kinetic bike trainer cone cups.
